1.0.18.title: Printing of Receipts
1.0.18.description: To enhance your productivity and quality of service delivery, we have made it possible for you to print out transaction receipts with the single tap of a button.

1.0.18.title: Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
1.0.18.description: We have made some subtle tweaks in the application, to enhance your experience.

1.0.18.title: Addition of Statement of Account to your Dashboard
1.0.18.description: We have added Statement of Account to your Dashboard, so you could see your records at a glance.

1.0.18.title: Cash Out transactions
1.0.18.description: Dispense cash to customers with Cash Out. Simply enter the customer's details including the paycode and cashout PIN and process the transaction!

1.0.16.title: Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
1.0.16.description: We have made some subtle tweaks in the application, to enhance your experience.

1.0.15.title: Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
1.0.15.description: We have made some subtle tweaks in the application, to enhance your experience.

1.0.14.title: Introducing Statement of Accounts
1.0.14.description: To support you with more robust reporting, we are providing views to your Statement of Transaction and Commission Accounts.

1.0.14.title: Auto-refresh on balances and mini-statement.
1.0.14.description: Your balances and mini-statement will automatically refresh to reflect latest transactions, as you transact.

1.0.14.title: Improved session management.
1.0.14.description: To improve your experience logging back into the platform, we have revamped our session management.

1.0.14.title: Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
1.0.14.description: We have made some subtle tweaks in the application, to enhance your experience.

1.0.13.title: Introducing Statement of Accounts
1.0.13.description: To support you with more robust reporting, we are providing views to your Statement of Transaction and Commission Accounts.

1.0.13.title: Auto-refresh on balances and mini-statement.
1.0.13.description: Your balances and mini-statement will automatically refresh to reflect latest transactions, as you transact.

1.0.13.title: Improved session management.
1.0.13.description: To improve your experience logging back into the platform, we have revamped our session management.

1.0.13.title: Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
1.0.13.description: We have made some subtle tweaks in the application, to enhance your experience.

1.0.12.title: Selling Data just got easier!
1.0.12.description: Data now has a home of its own. You guessed it! It is right alongside Airtime.

1.0.12.title: Fees are now displayed only when the customer pays them.
1.0.12.description: For a better experience, going forward, we will be taking fees off some views. Fees will only be displayed for transactions of which the fees are been paid by the customer.

1.0.12.title: Customer-specific payable amounts on few billers.
1.0.12.description: Transactions can now be made on the billers which have their own payable amounts for each of their customers.

1.0.12.title: Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
1.0.12.description: We have made some subtle little tweaks in the application, to enhance your experience.
